name: syllaby-postman-collection
description: Postman collection and environments for Syllaby API

scripts.push:collection: postman collection push syllaby-api-collection.json --name 'Syllaby API Collection'
scripts.push:env:local: postman environment push syllaby-local-environment.json --name 'Syllaby Local Development'
scripts.push:environments: npm run push:env:local && npm run push:env:dev && npm run push:env:staging && npm run push:env:prod
scripts.sync:all: npm run push:collection && npm run push:environments
scripts.pull:collection: echo 'Use Postman UI to export collection to this directory'

author: Syllaby Team
